title: Le Bourgeois Gentilhomme = the Would-Be Gentleman
brief_description:
Monsieur Jourdain is a vulgar nouveau-riche attempting to buy his way into the uppermost rings of society.

Credits: Director, Roger Coggio ; writers, Roger Coggio, Bernard G. Landry ; photography, Claude Lecomte ; music, Jean Bouchety ; choreography, Claude Bessy.
Cast: Rosy Varte, Roger Coggio, Ludmila Mikael, Michel Galabru, Jean-Pierre Darras, Robert Manuel, Etienne Chicot.
